Html:
Hello,

Our team works in VM with all users running off the same VS2010 install.  When I run the chirpy install, the bits are placed in my User folder -- like this:

C:\Users\JohnDoe\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Addins

How do I run the install so it's available for All Users?

http://chirpy.codeplex.com/discussions/248918

last post :

"The solution here was to create a folder like c:\vs-addins\ and dump all my custom addins in there instead, and then add that folder to the visual studio addin paths.

Download the vsix, open it as a zip, and take the files from inside and place the in for example your folder c:\vs-addins\chirpy"
